thoughts:
Shriuuuu, gifted me a new watch. I cried just 10 mins before writing this. She makes me feel the happiest, luckiest man in the world. She does so much for me.

I want to give her 10x more happiness. She is mazi chotusi bal. I wolf mazi Shriu soooo much.
Bad start to day. Bad middle of day, Good later half of the day. Evening me watched "Preemam" movie recommended by Shri. Cried at Gudi Padwa Scene. Night went best with Shriiiiiii~
